aka: I Spit on Your Corpse, I Piss on Your Grave
我唾弃你的坟墓，我在你坟墓上撒尿
我在你尸体上吐痰，我在你坟墓上撒尿

writer.name: 艾瑞克·斯坦泽 Eric Stanze

director.name: 艾瑞克·斯坦泽 Eric Stanze

trans_title: I Spit on Your Corpse, I Piss on Your Grave
我唾弃你的坟墓，我在你坟墓上撒尿
我在你尸体上吐痰，我在你坟墓上撒尿
introduction: Sandy has stumbled onto a lair of torture and humiliation. She was abducted and brought to this pit of pain as the next intended victim. But Sandy overthrows her captor and kills him. Does she release the other prisoners? Does she call the police? No. Her mind snaps and she assumes control over the prisoners, taking them as her own playtoys. Naked bodies writhe in ecstasy as blood runs down the walls in this chilling tale of madness and revenge. I SPIT ON YOUR CORPSE, I PISS ON YOUR GRAVE is a swirl of insanity, a carnival of carnage, a festival of filth, and an onslaught of sleaze!
